content: >this pattern can be downloaded also on payhip 1 with pay what you want option **pattern features ** - yardage estimate approx 25-35 grams of c1 rusty orange 10 grams of c2 white and 35-50 grams of c3 grey - knitted cuff down - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - four sizes small 60 sts medium 66 sts large 72 sts and extra-large 78 sts - mini gussets and a short row heel - charts but no written instructions for stranded colourwork - pattern proof-read by helena kahan 1 https //payhip com/product/edit/ubxkt
